# Reserved interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

When the parser encounters an expression with syntax reserved for later use, it emits a Reserved pattern element to represent it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Reserved 
```

## Remarks

As the meaning of this syntax is not yet defined or supported, it will always resolve with a fallback representation and emit an error.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [name?](./messageformat.reserved.name.md) |  | never | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ |
|  [operand?](./messageformat.reserved.operand.md) |  | [Literal](./messageformat.literal.md) \| [VariableRef](./messageformat.variableref.md) | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ |
|  [sigil](./messageformat.reserved.sigil.md) |  | '!' \| '@' \| '\#' \| '%' \| '^' \| '&amp;' \| '\*' \| '&lt;' \| '&gt;' \| '?' \| '\~' | **_(BETA)_** |
|  [source](./messageformat.reserved.source.md) |  | string | **_(BETA)_** |
|  [type](./messageformat.reserved.type.md) |  | 'reserved' | **_(BETA)_** |
